attributes.action: Force all maternity units to allow new fathers to stay with the mother /baby for as long as the couple like and make it compulsary for hospitals to provide free food to new fathers for first 24hours after the birth and allow the family to eat together with the baby.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increasingly fathers have an important supportive role to play in the birth and first few hours of a new babys life. 

Maternity units should recognise, respect and encourage this and the new family's bonding time and where a family wishes should drop outdated rules asking husbands to leave / mothers to leave thier babies alone to go and get food. This should be a right and the mothers choice that should be explained during pregnancy.
